description: This file defines the ApiSchemaService class providing methods to interact with API schema endpoints such as listing, retrieving, creating, updating, deleting, validating, publishing, unpublishing, exporting, importing, cloning, and version history management.

classes.name: ApiSchemaService
classes.description: A service class encapsulating API schema related API calls.

methods.name: getApiSchemas
methods.description: Fetches a paginated list of API schemas with optional search.

methods.name: getApiSchema
methods.description: Retrieves a specific API schema by its ID.

methods.name: createApiSchema
methods.description: Creates a new API schema with provided schema data.

methods.name: updateApiSchema
methods.description: Updates an existing API schema identified by ID.

methods.name: deleteApiSchema
methods.description: Deletes an API schema by ID.

methods.name: validateApiSchema
methods.description: Validates an API schema by ID.

methods.name: publishApiSchema
methods.description: Publishes an API schema by ID.

methods.name: unpublishApiSchema
methods.description: Unpublishes an API schema by ID.

methods.name: generateOpenApiSpec
methods.description: Generates OpenAPI specification for a schema.

methods.name: exportApiSchema
methods.description: Exports API schema in specified format (json, yaml, openapi).

methods.name: importApiSchema
methods.description: Imports an API schema from a file.

methods.name: cloneApiSchema
methods.description: Clones an existing API schema, assigning a new name.

methods.name: getApiSchemaVersions
methods.description: Retrieves version history of an API schema.
